text:
Hi, I am Edgar from Ucraft, and we are trying to integrate HubSpot to our App Store platform. To finalize the integration testing we need access for this request analytics.behavioral_events.send
who can help me with this?
Thanks in advance,
Hello I want to  integrate the Node.js code as a HubSpot Serverless function can anyone help me?
Hey everyone, Is it possible to edit a blog listing page containing dand areas in the page editor if the listing template is not in use?
I believe this is impossible, you must choose at least the default template.

Hi

I am trying to create a contact over the API using Nodejs
I got this error
403 - {"status":"error","message":"This hapikey (SECRET) does not have proper permissions! (requires all of [contacts-write])","correlationId":"07517635-f12b-49c3-9ed8-154843f11750"}
hapikeys are deprecated I would create a private app with the scopes you need
